  font-family: 'custom-icons';
  src: url("//www.topschooljobs.org/assets/dist/css/fonts/custom-icons.eot;v=be1aa274fa599c6ff02d8c44b9278995");

  font-style: normal; }

  justify-content: center;
  -ms-justify-content: center;
  -webkit-justify-content: center;
  align-items: stretch;
  -ms-align-items: stretch;
  -webkit-align-items: stretch;
  flex-wrap: nowrap;
  -ms-flex-wrap: nowrap;
  -webkit-flex-wrap: nowrap;
  display: flex;
  display: -ms-flex;
  display: -webkit-flex; }
  @media screen and (max-width: 650px) {
    .home .jobseeker-ctas &gt; .brick__inner &gt; .grid {
      flex-wrap: wrap;
      -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
      -webkit-flex-wrap: wrap; } }

  display: flex;
  display: -ms-flex;
  display: -webkit-flex; }
  @media screen and (max-width: 650px) {
    .home .jobseeker-ctas &gt; .brick__inner &gt; .grid &gt; .grid-item {
      flex-basis: 100%;
      -ms-flex-basis: 100%;
      -webkit-flex-basis: 100%; } }

  -ms-flex: 1;
  -webkit-flex: 1; }
